Class TaskDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog

              • net.sf.memoranda.ui.TaskDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class TaskDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    contributor
    Duncan McQuarrie - Team Haskell This class handles the GUI elements of TaskDialog Elements include; General Description, Phase Estimation Timer Log, and Defect Log.

      • convertTimertoHMS

        protected java.lang.String convertTimertoHMS(long time)

        Returns:
